mapper.select: SELECT user_id as userId, user_name as userName, password, email, email_yn as emailYn, admin_yn as adminYn, sub_city as subCity, tel, mod_id as modId, TO_CHAR(mod_dt,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') as modDt, reg_id as regId, TO_CHAR(reg_dt,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') as regDt FROM member WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND password = #{password}
SELECT user_id AS userId, password, user_name AS userName, email, tel FROM member WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member( user_id, password, user_name, email, email_yn, admin_yn, sub_city, tel, mod_id, mod_dt, reg_id, reg_dt ) VALUES( #{userId}, #{password}, #{userName}, #{email}, #{emailYn}, 0, #{subCity}, #{tel}, #{modId}, SYSDATE, #{regId}, SYSDATE )
